#include<stdio.h>
void rev(long *a)
{

  long rev=0,aliasa=*a;

  while(aliasa!=0)
  {

    rev=rev*10;
    rev=rev+aliasa%10;
    aliasa=aliasa/10;

  }

  *a=rev;

}
int main()
{

  int t;
  long a,b,sum;
  scanf("%d",&t);
  while(t--)
  {

   scanf("%ld%ld",&a,&b);
   rev(&a);
   rev(&b);

   sum=a+b;

   rev(&sum);

   printf("%ld\n",sum);

  }

  return 0;

}
